Description

A one-person indie studio based in Canada since March 1st, 2025. My mission is to bring back the nostalgia and thrill of 90's vehicle combat games using modern graphics and tech.

History

March 1st to present. Currently developing Mad Metal, a modern vehicle combat game for PC and consoles.

Projects

  • Mad Metal
